title: Anti-War
description:
Russia invades Ukraine inspiring possibly Kirk's boldest take (00:00:15). Tom Brady announces his first post-football move (00:09:00). Reaction to yesterday's Bob Snyder ass-kicking (00:27:15). Rear Admiral lays out his top 10 Boston movies (00:33:45). Neil Young inspires a conversation about artist legacies and if any of today's artist will reach legendary status (00:53:00). Billboard Chart Guy's ban stands, a Chris game & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
